thread.title: BRIEF-E Lighting Group Holdings Posts Qtrly ‍Loss And Total Comprehensive Expense Attributable Of Hk$2 Mln

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-E Lighting Group Holdings Posts Qtrly ‍Loss And Total Comprehensive Expense Attributable Of Hk$2 Mln

organizations.name: reuters) - e lighting group holdings ltd
brief-e lighting group holdings posts qtrly ‍loss

text:
Feb 9 (Reuters) - E Lighting Group Holdings Ltd:
* QTRLY REVENUE HK$25 MILLION VERSUS HK$24.2 MILLION ‍​ * QTRLY ‍ LOSS AND TOTAL COMPREHENSIVE EXPENSE ATTRIBUTABLE HK$2 MILLION VERSUS LOSS OF HK$99,000​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
